mapper.insert: INSERT INTO songlists( id, name, userId, songIds, remark, createdAt ) VALUES ( #{listId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{listName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{musicIds, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.id listId, a.name listName, a.userId userId, a.songIds musicIds, a.remark remark, DATE_FORMAT(a.createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.updatedAt, '%Y-%m-%d %T') updateTime FROM songlists a WHERE a.id = #{listId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM songlists a WHERE 1=1
AND a.userId = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
